about: Ultimate Yahtzee is a modern 3D dice game built entirely with MatrixEngineWGPU, a high-performance WebGPU-based rendering engine developed for creating interactive graphics directly in the browser. The game delivers smooth visuals, realistic dice physics, and an engaging user experience â€” all without requiring any plugins or installations. This project is powered by open technologies and is designed to be lightweight, fast, and highly customizable. Itâ€™s a great example of how WebGPU can be used for real-time interactive content. ðŸ”— Download / Try it: github.com/zlatnaspirala/matrix-engine-wgpu ðŸ›  License: The core engine and the Ultimate Yahtzee project are released under the GPL v3 license, making them free and open-source for both personal and commercial use â€” as long as you respect the terms of the license. Whether you're a developer, gamer, or enthusiast, Ultimate Yahtzee is a fun way to experience the potential of modern browser-based 3D technology.
